section.heading: Definition of joint and several contracts.
section.text: For the purposes of action thereon, a contract or obligation entered into by two or more persons, whether:

para.text: the persons are partners or joint contractors;
the contract is under seal or not;
it is written or verbal; or
it is expressed to be joint and several or not —

section.afterText: is deemed to be joint and several.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 16-2102 and § 16-2103.
